details.description:
Myspace Exclusive!
This incredible one bed bedroom apartment is just south of the Williamsburg Bridge and short distance to some of the best restaurants and bars Brooklyn has to offer! The apartment has an L-shaped living area with big windows, stainless steel kitchen, exposed brick.
The building is an extremely well-maintained 1920s prewar featuring stainless appliances, hardwood floors, tons of sunlight, high ceilings and lots of space. Pet friendly, heat; hot water included!
Call today, as this listing will not last.
September 1 move in Small pets OK Broker fee applies

Gorgeous two bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg - just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains. Could also be used a 1 bedroom plus home office. The apartment features: Hardwood floors, Spacious et-in style kitchen with stainless steel appliances, Large living room, 1 queen size and 1 twin size bedroom. Heat; Hot Water is included and there is rooftop access. Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
July 1 move in Small pets OK No broker fee

Super sized 2 bedroom in prime Williamsburg!
- no broker fee
2 nice bedrooms Large living area with windows Stainless steel kitchen Heat and hot water included Exposed brick
Perfect location, near all things that make Williamsburg, Williamsburg! JMZ and G trains nearby. Local hotspots such as L'Industrie Pizzeria, Pies 'n' Thighs, Vanessa's Dumpling House, Banter Bar, Nighthawk Cinema, etc
Available 9/1 Small pets accepted

The Baltic Canal ? Modern Living in Boerum Hill
Studios, 1-; 2-BR homes with oversized windows, white oak floors, custom kitchens, spa-style baths, and in-unit or on-site laundry. Select residences offer private balconies or terraces.
Amenities: Bike room, elevator, package room, gym, media room, and multiple outdoor spaces ? deck, garden, patio; panoramic roof deck.
Unbeatable location at the crossroads of Boerum Hill, Gowanus; Park Slope, near Whole Foods, top restaurants, boutique shops; F/G/R trains.
📅 Schedule your tour today and make The Baltic Canal your next home.

amenities.other: Balcony/Terrace, Dishwasher, Washer/Dryer In Unit, Central A/C

details.description:
Virtual tours available!
Beautiful apartment in Williamsburg, prime location!
This apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedroom(s), stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout.
You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Westlight, Brooklyn Bowl, Extra Fancy, Lucky Dog, Baby's All Right, Patrizia's, Battery Harris, Post Office, and Freehold.
Short commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.

Modern 1 Bed / 1 Bath at 584 4th Ave- Gowanus
Welcome to 584 4th Ave, a brand-new luxury development in the heart of Gowanus. This spacious 1-bedroom features floor-to-ceiling windows with sweeping views of Manhattan, the Statue of Liberty, and city bridges.
Enjoy premium amenities including:
Elevator
Rooftop with panoramic views
Fitness center
In-unit washer/dryer
Located near Park Slope with easy access to the F, G, D, N, and R trains, this building offers the perfect mix of style, comfort, and convenience.
Pets allowed upon approval.
Schedule a tour today!

Sunny 2BR Near Montrose L ? Great Layout; Location Two true bedrooms on opposite ends, hardwood floors, built-in shelving, and two large closets. Kitchen includes a dishwasher. Heat and hot water included.
Unbeatable location?just steps to the Montrose L, local grocery stores, bars, and restaurants.

Virtual tours available! Beautiful 2 bed / 1 bath apartment in East Williamsburg, prime location! This apartment features spacious living room, queen-sized bedroom, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout. You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Roberta's, Sweet Science, Honey's, Wayward Social, Syndicated, Guadalupe, Reclamation, Ichiran, Momo Sushi Shack, El Cortez. Short commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods. Only blocks from the G train, and a short walk to the L train.

Modern 2br/1bth at 584 4th Ave- Gowanus
Welcome to 584 4th Ave, a brand-new luxury development in the heart of Gowanus. This spacious 2 bed features floor-to-ceiling windows with sweeping views of Manhattan, the Statue of Liberty, and city bridges.
Enjoy premium amenities including:
Elevator
Rooftop with panoramic views
Fitness center
In-unit washer/dryer
Located near Park Slope with easy access to the F, G, D, N, and R trains, this building offers the perfect mix of style, comfort, and convenience.

Beautiful apartment in Williamsburg, prime location!
This apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedroom(s), stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout.
You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Westlight, Brooklyn Bowl, Extra Fancy, Lucky Dog, Baby's All Right, Patrizia's, Battery Harris, Post Office, and Freehold.
Short commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.

Set on Franklin Street in Greenpoint, this apartment offers a comfortable layout with hardwood floors and plenty of natural light. The location puts you close to neighborhood cafes, shops, and the waterfront, with easy access to the G train at Greenpoint Avenue and several bus lines for a quick commute. A practical choice for anyone looking to enjoy the best of Brooklyn living.

Luxury Waterfront Living at 44 Kent
Experience modern living on the northern Brooklyn waterfront. This luxury building offers a finished rooftop with sweeping views of Manhattan and the Williamsburg Bridge.
Amenities include a fitness center, business center, bike storage, and optional parking. Inside, each unit features condo-quality finishes: central air, dishwasher, beautiful hardwood floors, designer windows, and more.

Spacious 1BR in a modern elevator building with one of the biggest living rooms you?ll find?room for dining, lounging, and working. Bright and airy with oversized windows, a large kitchen, great storage, and in-unit washer/dryer. A/C in every room, big closets, sunny bedroom.
Building perks: gym, roof deck, pet spa, parking (for a fee), lounge, bike storage. No broker fee.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Washer/Dryer In Unit, Central A/C

details.description: Located on a quiet block in prime Williamsburg, this true two-bedroom offers great space and even better location. Both bedrooms have windows, closets, and comfortably fit queen beds. The layout features a separate living room and a renovated kitchen. Just a quick walk to the Bedford L and Marcy JMZ trains, and when you're ready to unwind, head upstairs to the rooftop for wide-open Manhattan views and epic sunsets over the water.

Located on a quiet block in prime Williamsburg, this true two-bedroom offers great space and even better location. Both bedrooms have windows, closets, and comfortably fit queen beds. The layout features a separate living room and a renovated kitchen. Just a quick walk to the Bedford L and Marcy JMZ trains, and when you're ready to unwind, head upstairs to the rooftop for wide-open Manhattan views and epic sunsets over the water.
1 month free

Bright and spacious two-bedroom with great flow and character! The home features tall ceilings, a skylight that fills the common area with sunlight, and a large living room perfect for entertaining or relaxing. Both bedrooms have their own windows and closets, and there?s an additional lofted space upstairs that can be used as an office, studio, or guest nook. All of this just around the corner from Maria Hernandez Park.

Modern 1 Bed / 1 Bath at 584 4th Ave- Gowanus

Virtual tours available!
Beautiful 1 bed / 1 bath apartment in Bushwick, prime location! This apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout. You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Mominette, Sea Wolf, Three Diamond Door, Precious Metal, The Rookery, Archie's, Heavy Woods, Idlewild, Clara's, Yours Sincerely, Chuko, Los Hermanos, Wheelhouse.
Short commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods. Only blocks from the L train, and a short walk to the J, M trains.

No Fee ? Luxury 1 Bed / 1 Bath in Brand New Elevator Building in Clinton Hill!
Modern design meets prime location in this spacious 1-bedroom, 1 bath apartment featuring hardwood floors, high ceilings, central A/C, and a private balcony. The open layout is perfect for entertaining, and each bedroom offers great light and flexibility.
Enjoy top-notch amenities including: ? Elevator ? Gym ? Lounge; Game Room ? Shared Workspace; Public Wifi ? Laundry Room; Bike Storage ? Furnished Rooftop with Skyline Views ? Courtyard; Outdoor Spaces ? Dishwasher, Eat-In Kitchen, Stainless Steel Appliances
Just 1 block from the Franklin Ave C/S trains?15 minutes to Manhattan. Close to Outpost, Doris, Sisters, and other local favorites.
First; Security Only | No Fee | Pets on Approval

details.description:
Prime Crown Heights Living at 1499 Bedford Ave!
Discover the epitome of modern living at 1499 Bedford Ave, a new building in the heart of Crown Heights. Located steps from Eastern Parkway and multiple subway lines, and within walking distance of Grand Army Plaza, Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, and Prospect Park, this residence offers unparalleled convenience and vibrant city life.
Building Amenities:
State-of-the-art fitness room Pet wash station Laundry facilities (in-unit laundry in some units) Social lounge with game room Furnished rooftop with panoramic city views Second-floor public terrace Open workstations Dedicated mail room
Unit Features: Private terraces and balconies in select units Kitchen islands in select units Large windows with abundant natural light Stunning views of NYC skyline, Prospect Park, and neighborhood streets
Welcome to 1499 Bedford Ave?where luxury, community, and convenience meet. Experience the best of Crown Heights living.

BRAND NEW LUXURY BUILDING nestled in the vibrant Greenpoint neighborhood!!
APARTMENT FEATURES: Gleaming Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Appliances Central Air Conditioning; Heating Inquire about the availability of Private Balconies
BUILDING AMENITIES: Rooftop Deck with Stunning Views Elevator for Convenience On-Site Laundry Rooms State-of-the-Art Fitness Center Recreational Room Comfortable Tenant Lounge Package Room for Deliveries Bike Storage Parking available($300 monthly) Pet-Friendly Environment First; Security - NO BROKER FEE.
Conveniently located near L train at Lorimer and right next to McCarren Park.

This building is arguably THE MOST desirable neighborhood in Brooklyn. Right on the Williamsburg Waterfront with gorgeous river and city views, all the restaurants, coffee shops, bars, art and music venues, plant shops, parks, farmers markets, grocers, and absolutely anything and everything else you could desire right outside your door. Be warned: the luxury experience you are offered inside the building may leave you feeling torn about whether to go out and enjoy the bustle of the neighborhood or stay in and enjoy your own amenities right here at home!Conveniently located off the J. M, and L trains, as well as the B32, B62, and Q59 bus routes.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Dishwasher Central A/C and Heat Private Balcony Excellent light from extra large windows
BUILDING FEATURES: Bike Room Courtyard Elevator Fitness Center Laundry Room Tenant Lounge Package Room Finished Roof Deck First; Security NO FEE

amenities.other: Balcony/Terrace, Central A/C, Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Private Outdoor Space, Roof Access, Shared Outdoor Space, Washer/Dryer In Unit

details.description:
LUXURY BUILDING nestled in the vibrant Greenpoint neighborhood!!
APARTMENT FEATURES: Gleaming Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Appliances Central Air Conditioning; Heating Inquire about the availability of Private Balconies
BUILDING AMENITIES: Rooftop Deck with Stunning Views Elevator for Convenience On-Site Laundry Rooms State-of-the-Art Fitness Center Recreational Room Comfortable Tenant Lounge Package Room for Deliveries Bike Storage Parking available($300 monthly) Pet-Friendly Environment First; Security - NO BROKER FEE.
Conveniently located near L train at Lorimer and right next to McCarren Park.

The perfect spot for a central Williamsburg vibe in a slightly quieter area! Don't worry though, that busy waterfront is only a short walk away :) Find all the restaurants, coffee shops, bars, art and music venues, plant shops, parks, farmers markets, grocers, and absolutely anything and everything else you could desire right outside your door. East Williamsburg is still an amazing, diverse, and community-centered neighborhood with great accessibility to almost any other Brooklyn area and a very easy commute to Manhattan. Conveniently located off the L, J. M, and G trains, as well as the B43, B46, B48, and B60 bus routes.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Central A/C and Heat
BUILDING FEATURES: Laundry Room Finished Roof Deck

Introducing a brand new luxury building located in the charming Vinegar Hill area of DUMBO! Indulge in breathtaking views spanning both the Manhattan Bridge and Brooklyn Bridge. Immerse yourself in the abundance of nearby parks, including John St Park, Main St Park, Trinity Park, Brooklyn Bridge Park, Cadman Plaza Park, Whitman Park, and many more. Delight in the long-established, delectable local restaurants such as Bridge Coffee, while still satisfying those late-night cravings at spots we all secretly adore (*cough Shake Shack), just a few blocks away. Experience the perfect blend of old-school Brooklyn charm and modern luxury living, and prepare to fall in love with your new home here.
Convenience is key, as the building is conveniently located near the A, C, and F trains, as well as the B57, B62, and B69 bus routes.
Unit Features: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen with Dishwasher; Microwave Central A/C; Heat Private Balconies available upon inquiry In-unit laundry available upon inquiry
Building Features: Rooftop Deck Laundry Room Fitness Center Recreation Room Tenant Lounge Package Room Bike Storage Pets Allowed First; Security deposit required No broker fee!
Come and experience the epitome of luxury living in this exceptional new building. Don't miss out on this opportunity to make it your new home.

amenities.other: Balcony/Terrace, Central A/C, Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Roof Access, Shared Outdoor Space, Washer/Dryer In Unit

details.description: Discover your new home at 31-19 37th St, where comfort and style meet in perfect harmony. This stunning industrial-chic apartment offers two sunlit bedrooms and a large private patio in a building filled with modern amenities. Experience the charm of historic Astoria while enjoying conveniences such as an elevator, a laundry room, a residents' lounge, and a fully furnished rooftop with breathtaking views of the Manhattan skyline. With easy access to the N/Q lines at Broadway and the R/M lines at Steinway, you'll be just 20 minutes away from Midtown.

Luxury Apartments at 931 Carroll Street
Welcome to 931 Carroll Street, a brand-new luxury rental building in the heart of Brooklyn. Just a block from the Brooklyn Botanical Gardens and the Brooklyn Museum, and within walking distance of Prospect Park, this location offers an unbeatable blend of culture and nature. Only 2 blocks from the 2, 3, 4, 5 trains and the Shuttle to the A, C, Q trains, you're perfectly positioned for quick access across the city.
Offering studio, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom apartments, each unit boasts modern design, premium finishes, and oversized windows with stunning views.
Features include: In-unit washer/dryer Dishwasher Hardwood floors Private outdoor space (balcony, courtyard, or patio) Central air and expansive windows for natural light
Building Amenities: State-of-the-art fitness center Landscaped rooftop terrace with panoramic city views Tranquil courtyard for relaxation Garage parking, bike room, and storage options Media room, package room, and pet spa
Live in luxury, surrounded by cultural landmarks and green spaces. With excellent public transportation and nearby shopping and dining options, 931 Carroll Street is your gateway to the best of Brooklyn.

amenities.other: Balcony/Terrace, Dishwasher, Washer/Dryer In Unit, Central A/C
